articles.title: Over 30 lakh consumers avail 100% power subsidy in Delhi: Report
articles.description: Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal announced on Thursday that from October 1, the Delhi government will provide subsidies on electricity to consumers who opt for the scheme.
